title: Hero (Spiderman)
lyrics:
(Bm) I am so high, I can hear (G)heaven
(Bm) I am so high, I can hear (G)heaven
Whoa, but (Bb)heaven
No, (C)heaven don't hear (G)me (G-stop)
 
[chorus]
And they say that a (Bb)hero could save us
I'm (C)not gonna stand here and (D)wait
I'll hold onto the (Bb)wings of the eagles
(C)Watch as they all fly a(D)waaaay
 
(Bm) Someone told me... love would all (G)save us
(Bm) But, how can that be... look what love (G)gave us
A world full of (Bb)killing and blood (C)spilling that world never (G)ca-ame (G-stop)
 
[chorus]
And they say that a (Bb)hero could save us
I'm (C)not gonna stand here and (D)wait
I'll hold onto the (Bb)wings of the eagles
(C)Watch as they all fly a(D)way
 
[solo]
(Bb)  (C)  (D)
(Bb)  (C)  (G)  (G-stop)
 
[soft strum]
Now that the (Bb)world isn't ending
It's (C)love that I'm sending to (D)you
It isn't the (Bb)love of a hero
And (C)that's why I fear it won't (G)do
 
[chorus]
And they say that a (Bb)hero could save us
I'm (C)not gonna stand here and (D)wait
I'll hold onto the (Bb)wings of the eagles
(C)Watch as they all fly a(D)way
 
[outro]
And they’re watching us ((Bb)watching us)
They’re watching us ((C)watching us)
As we all fly a(D)way
 
And they’re watching us ((Bb)watching us)
They’re watching us ((C)watching us)
As we all fly a(D)way
 
And they’re watching us ((Bb)watching us)
They’re watching us ((C)watching us)
As we all fly a(D)way-(C)ay-(D)ay (C)oooh (D) [end]
